body:
Looks like `pdftk` download site is suffering from bitrot.

"""==> Fetching https://www.pdflabs.com/tools/pdftk-the-pdf-toolkit/pdftk-2.02-src.zip
##O#- #                                                                                
curl: (60) SSL certificate problem: certificate has expired
More details here: https://curl.haxx.se/docs/sslcerts.html

curl failed to verify the legitimacy of the server and therefore could not
establish a secure connection to it. To learn more about this situation and
how to fix it, please visit the web page mentioned above.
==> Fetching from https://www.pdflabs.com/tools/pdftk-the-pdf-toolkit/pdftk-2.02-src.zip failed.
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for pdftk-2.02-mhxfamfyxncinb4higlgqdrklledz7tk

/home2/rpfische/spack7/lib/spack/spack/package.py:962, in do_fetch:
        959                raise FetchError("Will not fetch %s" %
        960                                 self.spec.format('$_$@'), ck_msg)
        961
  >>    962        self.stage.create()
        963        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only)
        964        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
        965
"""
title: Problems fetching pdftk
